person.persName: Thomas W. Gardner (Louisville, Kentucky, bricklayer and private (U.S.A.))

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, bricklayer and soldier. Middlesex County, Virginia, native. Married to Jane Turner Gardner in Louisville, Kentucky, on November 29, 1865. Bricklayer in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1861. Served in the 15th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private from December 14, 1861, to January 5, 1862. Discharged due to disability on June 5, 1862. Brick mason in Christian County in 1863.
